definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

sentences.english: You can describe all of these formats with regular expressions.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些格式都可以用正则表达式来描述。

sentences.english: The global fast dynamics for the generalized symmetric regularized long wave equation is considered.
sentences.chinese: 考虑了对称正则长波方程的整体快变动力学。

sentences.english: This pattern object represents the regular expression that is defined in text format.
sentences.chinese: 该模式对象代表以文本格式定义的正则表达式。

sentences.english: Differentiating between greediness and laziness is key to fully understanding advanced regular expressions.
sentences.chinese: 理解贪婪与懒惰的区别是运用高级正则表达式的基础。

sentences.english: The case of regular solutions of nonlinear PDAEs is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 并研究了非线性偏微分方程组的解在正则部分的情形。

sentences.english: A associative ring R is called a regular ring if every left principle ideal of it is generated by an idempotent.
sentences.chinese: 每一个主左理想均由一个幂等元生成的环叫正则环。

sentences.english: Whitespace in the regular expression that isn't inside a character class is ignored.
sentences.chinese: 在正则表达式中不在字符类中的空白符被忽略。

sentences.english: Finally, this paper gives applications of the above results to quasiregular mappings.
sentences.chinese: 最后，给出上述结论在拟正则映射中的应用。

sentences.english: To achieve this in the above example, you use a regular expression to perform the replacement.
sentences.chinese: 为此，上例中使用正则表达式进行替换。

sentences.english: In Chapter 2, we discussed the applications of homotopy regular morphism.
sentences.chinese: 第二章讨论同伦正则态射的应用。

sentences.english: There exists an irregular semigroups in which joins of good congruences are good.
sentences.chinese: 存在所有好余的并都是好余的非正则半群。

sentences.english: The canonical transformation method is proposed for symplectic conservative perturbation approximation.
sentences.chinese: 然后给出正则变换的摄动保辛方法。

sentences.english: Super-resolved image restoration technique from a single image was studied by edge-preserving regularization.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究单帧图像超分辨重构的正则化方法。

sentences.english: The ill-posedness inherent in the bandlimited signal extrapolation problem can be treated by means of regularization parameters.
sentences.chinese: 引进正则参数能够处理数据外推问题的内在不稳定性。

sentences.english: Quasi-regular quadrature formulas have also been discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文还讨论了拟正则求积公式。

sentences.english: To deal with this dilemma, you can use advanced regular expressions .
sentences.chinese: 为了解决这个困境，你可以使用一些高级的正则。

definition: adopted name of Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石[Jiang3 Jie4 shi2]
(Beijing dialect) see 陣子|阵子[zhen4 zi5]
lit. pull up a plant and the roots follow (idiom); fig. also involving others/inextricably tangled together/Invite one and he'll tell all his friends.
doctrine (esp. religious)/argumentation (in a speech or essay)
lit. to go straight (idiom, from Analects); to act with integrity
to study the underlying principle to acquire knowledge (idiom); pursuing knowledge to the end
